mapper.sql: id, process_id, title, start_time, end_time, originator_user_id, originator_dept_id, originator_dept_name, STATUS, RESULT, business_id, invoice_company, contract_name_and_number, invoice_reason, invoice_type, invoice_name, taxpayer_number, address_and_telephone, bank_and_account, invoice_content, invoice_amount, tax_rate, invoice_explain, invoice_start_time, invoice_finish_time, amount_received, create_time, update_time
mapper.select:
select
from ding_process t where 1=1
and t.update_time>=FROM_UNIXTIME(#{startTime}/1000 ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and t.update_time<=FROM_UNIXTIME(#{endTime}/1000,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and RESULT='agree' AND STATUS='COMPLETED' order by t.update_time desc
mapper.update: update ding_process set process_id = #{processId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, originator_user_id = #{originatorUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, originator_dept_id = #{originatorDeptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, originator_dept_name = #{originatorDeptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESULT = #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_id = #{businessId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invoice_company = #{invoiceCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_name_and_number = #{contractNameAndNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invoice_reason = #{invoiceReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invoice_type = #{invoiceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invoice_name = #{invoiceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, taxpayer_number = #{taxpayerNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address_and_telephone = #{addressAndTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_and_account = #{bankAndAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invoice_content = #{invoiceContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invoice_amount = #{invoiceAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tax_rate = #{taxRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invoice_explain = #{invoiceExplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invoice_start_time = #{invoiceStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invoice_finish_time = #{invoiceFinishTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amount_received = #{amountReceived,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where process_id = #{processId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
